title: Clique: 2 blocks mined then : "Failed to prepare header for mining  err=unauthorized"

body: As far as I know, the JavaScript console only temporarily unlocks an account, so after some time (5 mins I believe), it will get locked back up. You can permanently unlock an account from the CLI, or from within the console you can do `personal.unlockAccount("0x...", "password", 0)`, where the last `0` means to permanently unlock.

Hmmm, it shouldn't have let you mine the second block. If you have 4 signers, then each singer is allowed to sign 1 out of 3 blocks. That's probably the reason why it goes belly up. I'll have to look into it though as to why it managed to sign the second block. Let me try to repro it and I'll get back to you.

Nvm, found the bug. It can only ever happen when starting the chain (and it will happen if the number of miners > 3) :)) Will submit a fix in a moment.
